1.title: Leading Ladies
1.plot: Wives and girlfriends of the Ottawa Senators get candid about living with a professional athlete, giving back to the community, and the eye-opening experience of working with pregnant teenagers at the Youville Centre in Ottawa.

2.title: Food and Fitness
2.plot: Alumni and members of the Ottawa Senators Hockey Club promote healthy lifestyles at local schools and community groups, and demonstrate the importance of athletic diversity beyond hockey.

1.title: Mental Health
1.plot: Suicide prevention is top-of-mind for two Ottawa families who want to help break the stigma of mental health in the city.

2.title: Pediatric Palliative Care
2.plot: What's it really like to deliver hospice care for kids? The story behind Roger's House and a few of the Ottawa families who see it as a second home.

3.title: School Programs and Summer Camps
3.plot: Drug-addicted teens and at-risk youth are given a second chance through special programs supported by the Ottawa Senators foundation, while elementary kids use hockey as an incentive to reach higher learning goals.

imdb.plot outline: For the Ottawa Senators Foundation, passion has no off-season. Game Changers profiles the people and programs making a difference in our city through the help of the NHL hockey club's not-for-profit side. From mental health awareness campaigns to amateur sport initiatives around the city, this series profiles people who are transforming Ottawa one initiative at a time.
imdb.title: Game Changers
plot: _Game Changers_ (qv) profiles the people and programs making a difference in Ottawa through the help of the NHL hockey club's not-for-profit side.::Anonymous
